description: The city and state to retrieve the weather for, in the format 'city+state'. Replace spaces with '+' in the location string.
name: location

collection.label: VAGUE
collection.sentence:
You can add the
desired location to the URL in your request like this:

    
    
    $ curl wttr.in/London
    $ curl wttr.in/Moscow
    $ curl wttr.in/Salt+Lake+City
    

If you omit the location name, you will get the report for your current
location based on your IP address.
